content.text: Not to be confused with Pam Halpert, Pam is a stranger played by Sarah Zimmerman and encountered by Dwight and NateÂ in the season 7 episode "China." While discovering the empty lot that Pam Halpert claimed as the site for a prospective modern office suite, Dwight and Nate accidentally meet a random woman who happened to hear Dwight saying "Pam" aloud and approached their vehicle. After a brief exchange, Dwight relishes the outcome exclaiming that he "Can't wait to do to Pam, what he just did to Pam."
